TopicTitle: how to warp in space when boosters are on

Articles.Content: you can hit alt+ . to move into physics warp. That will allow you to fire your engines and move time faster at the same time, but this may result in rapid unplanned dis-assembly.

^this

You also shouldn't be using boosters in space.... but hey your ship!

"Booster" can be a general term for a rocket stage that is meant to accelerate you into a higher orbit (as opposed to stages used for multipurpose orbital maneuvering). It doesn't have to refer to solid fuel systems.
